entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Re-enable WOW64 support in ANCM #60978
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, json_middleware #60975
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-noop, json #60974
  • Quarantine `Reset_DuringRequestBody_Resets` - timeouts #60973
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Only references the first list correctly - OpenAPI definition #60972
  • Blazor: Better stacktrace for exceptions in rendering logic, including line number in Razor files #60971
  • In Minimal API Content-type of the response is overriden with application/json making it unusable for SSE #60965

Closed

  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #60966
  • Problem Details camel case RFC 7807 "compliant casing" #59396
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-alpha.1.25057.15] CleanArchitecture1 get error: System.TypeLoadException: Method 'get_Description' in type 'FastEndpoints.ProducesResponseTypeMetadata' from assembly FastEndpoints does not have an implementation. #59804
  • Quarantine RadioButtonGetsResetAfterSubmittingEnhancedForm #60873
    .NET 10 Planning
  • EventCallback HasDelegate=false in InteractiveServer child component from an SSR parent #60954
  • Perf regression: kestrel-encoded-url #60944
  • Blazor work doesn't seem to take place within an activity #60788
  • I am having trouble migrating Blazor WASM SPA project to component rendering ( mix between wasm and server render) #60748

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix OpenAPI XML code gen #60977
    area-mvc
  • Use trim-safe ValidationContext constructor and update RuntimeParameterInfoResolver #60976
    area-minimal
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • Use Kind Artifact metadata and minor improvements to Signing/Publishing.props #60967
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Only build the target platform in native projs for the VMR #60910
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Add default implementation to OpenAPI's new Description property to prevent a breaking change #60937
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview3
  • Add doc owners column to area owners table #60818
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Rename `DisableMatchAllIgnoresLeftUriPart` to `EnableMatchAllForQueryStringAndFragmentSwitchKey` #60969
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview3
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.3.25167.4 #60968
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview3
  • Fix `RadioButtonGetsResetAfterSubmittingEnhancedForm` #60920
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor Decrypt() and Encrypt() flow #59424
    area-dataprotection, blog-candidate
  • Make default stack size to be 1 MB in base16 #60811
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [Blazor] InputBase - SetCurrentValueAsync + SetCurrentValueAsStringAsync (fix for #44105) #54279
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add `NotFound` method in `NavigationManager` for interactive and static rendering #60752
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc
  • pin gha #60948
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve flaky tests, move tests blockade. #60930
    test-failure, area-blazor, .NET 10 Planning

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-17
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Document breaking change for proposal discussion Wednesday #9230
  • Describe scoping rules for extension declaration type parameters and receiver parameter #9229
  • Extensions: update with decisions from LDM 2025-03-17 #9228

Merged

  • Extensions: update open issues for next LDM #9224

Updated

  • Dictionary expressions: updates and clarifications #9216

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Also look for IDesignTimeServices in the target assembly #35806
    Backlog
  • Problem with Oracle provider when DbContext abstract base class in a different assembly to concrete DbContext #35803
  • Unable to create migration bundle on windows-2022 agent image caused by locked files #35802
  • Inconsistent INSERT and UPDATE escaping of JSON strings #35800
  • Scaffold does not generate Entity class for Table containing multiple FK and PK #35798
  • Migrate to the new solution format (SLNX) #35797
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `efcore/release/9.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #35796

Closed

  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer injected through Nuget #35801
  • `dotnet-ef migrations script` omits required `GO` separators in EF Core 9, causing SQL batch errors #35731
  • Why do the results returned by the full query and projection query differ after the tracked entity is modified in Entity Framework Core? #35790
  • Inconsistent ToTable overloads #35799

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/10.0-preview3] Disable Cosmos tests #35805
    tell-mode
  • Add support for complex type discriminator. #35744
  • update branding to preview 4 #35804

Updated

  • Report debug log for connection cancellation #35793
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35769

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] CollectionView cell not expanding on label expanding to wrap #28454
  • `ShellContent` routes do not call `ApplyQueryAttributes` #28453
  • System.MissingMethodException: 'Method not found: void Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Internals.PropertyPropagationExtensions.PropagatePropertyChanged(string,Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Element,System.Collections.IEnumerable)' #28450
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Visual State doesn't work when GestureRecognizers is applied on CollectionView Items #28449
  • [Windows] DragGestureRecognizer's DropCompleted event is not called #28448
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice #28446
  • [iOS] Navigation breaks when modal pages use PageSheet #28444
  • [NET 10] Move the GetBackButtonVisibleCalculated logic inside ShouldShowToolbarButton #28443
  • [Android] Handler layouting issues discovered for NumberPicker View #28442
  • FlyoutPage IsPresented not updated properly in windows #28440
  • Setting HeightRequest and WidthRequest of an ActivityIndicator, the size does not change #28439
  • MAUI WebViewer not working on MacOS even after allowing permissions to wkWebView #28438

Closed

  • Add CancellationToken to WebAuthenticator #26137
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Push Notification Icon Badge Count Not Updating when app kill or in background #28370
  • MAUI MAP control - To add new marker with icon #28436
  • Updating a ControlTemplate at runtime causes it to disappear. #15649
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]The project keeps loading when run the .NET 10 MAUI Blazor Hybrid App. #27806
    .NET 10.0-preview2
  • No Role is defined as buttons for work, personal, health, family and friends in tags section: A11y_.NET 9 template_Projects_Name Role Value. #26913
    .NET 9 SR6
  • .Net Maui projects are under Other > Custom instead of Multi-Platform #16846
    Backlog
  • maui BackgroundService #28435
  • SIGSEGV on Android 5.1.1 #28170

PullRequests

Created

  • System.MissingMethodException in PropertyPropagationExtensions fix #28456
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Recover the uitest-build task on Android cake #28452
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.3 to 1.0.4 #28447
    area-templates, community ✨
  • [NET10] Enable Nullability on ShellPageRendererTracker #28441
    area-controls-shell

Merged

  • Able to cancel WebAuthenticator.AuthenticateAsync programmatically using a CancellationToken #26137 #26180
    t/breaking 💥, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-webauth, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28445
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fixed content update issue when changing the ControlTemplate at runtime for a ContentPage #28216
    community ✨, area-controls-pages, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Accessibility] Add 'button' for TalkBalk on Android Tap Gesture Recognizers #28393
    platform/android 🤖, area-gestures, t/a11y, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Accessibility] Add Accessibility Traits to CollectionView items on iOS/Catalyst #27971
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6

Updated

  • CollectionView display is broken when setting IsVisible after items are added - Fix #28425
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Mac Catalyst] `NullReferenceException` in `DragAndDropDelegate` - FIX #28417
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-gestures, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • Bring back iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation via inheritance #28434
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Essentials] Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled #27941
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-geolocation, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Make IShape in MauiCALayer a WeakReference #28412
    area-drawing, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Testing] Fix: BlankScreenOnNavigationBack on Android #28423
    area-testing, community ✨, testing-flakiness
  • [net10.0] Trimmable view handlers #28357
    area-core-hosting
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, stale
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-webview
  • Fixed SearchHandler Keyboard does not dismiss when unfocus #28186
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix SafeArea management on iOS #28283
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Draft][Accessibility] Add Accessibility Traits to CollectionView items on Android #28388
    area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y
  • [NET10.0] Annotate `ListStringTypeConverter` for nullability #28244
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Windows] Fixed Horizontal Spacing for Horizontal List #28311
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-gestures
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-gestures
  • [iOS] GraphicsView DrawString - fix #26304
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android, iOS] - Flyout icon should remain visible when a page is pushed onto a NavigationPage or Shell page with the back button disabled. #28187
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-flyout, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Flyout Menu Icon disappears from Window Title Bar after Navigation #28240
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] ToolbarItems Tooltip text color #28427
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fixed FlyoutMenu icon issue when clearing and adding items #28241
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Label text is cropped inside the border control with a specific padding value on certain Android devices #28259
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Label Not Vertically Centered with MinimumHeightRequest #28270
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for border color of the RadioButton is visible in Windows #28214
    community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for RadioButton BorderColor and BorderWidth not updated at runtime #28335
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed GraphicsView drawable is visible outside the canvas #28353
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android, iOS] Dynamically setting SearchHandler Query property does not update text in the search box #28400
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix ImageButton not rendering correctly based on its bounds #28309
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Label not sized correctly on Android #28215
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] WebView Navigated event is still called even after cancelling the Navigation. #28340
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed BackButton visibility issue when switching tabs without NavigationPage #28371
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 7 #28409
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Stepper allows incrementing beyond the maximum value #28398

    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-refreshview

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenProjectAsync fails when dotnet is not pre-installed in the system #77640
  • Stop visual studio from adding double quotes to next raw string literal #77638

Closed

  • Factor MSBuild workspace into a separate package #212
    Backlog
  • Collapse usings on file open doesn't apply when the usings was manually expanded previously #76117
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35917.10 #77639

PullRequests

Created

  • Another small set of package initialization optimizations #77646
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure we get telemetry signal for `Implement with Copilot` Code Fix #77643
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Generate Documentation - Bug Fixes #77641
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge vs deps forward #77636
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77644
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Attempt to further reduce thread switches during package load. #77602
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add feature flag controlling Copilot prompt in Semantic Search #77562
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Relax signature collision rules for static extension methods" #77642
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Remove specialized GC logic in Roslyn #77628
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Correct how we pick up options for `ICopilotOptionsService` #77620
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix out of bounds in text extent computation (#77402) #77598
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Relax signature collision rules for static extension methods #77603
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

Updated

  • Change keys for import caching #77627
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • On-the-fly-docs Pass along additional context #77510
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use ActivationConstraint.FeatureFlag API to control when Semantic Search is enabled #77133
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Remove old options related to solution crawler #77625
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update Razor EA #77194
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Ref Fields
  • Extensions: update semantic model APIs #77619
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Extensions: flesh out behavior for some pattern-based binding scenarios #77608
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Add support for static extension method completion #77631
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add more modern-extension FAR tests #77503
    Area-IDE, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add doc owners to area-owners table #113629
  • Test failure in HttpRequestMessageTest.HttpStreamingDisabledBy_WasmEnableStreamingResponse_InProject #113628
  • Jit fails in persisted assembly using `Opcodes.CallI` to call managed method #113626
  • JIT: Consider moving tailcall-to-loop opt to happen earlier #113623
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow the user to provide state for a ComWrappers.GetOrCreateObjectForComInstance operation #113622
    10.0.0
  • [Android AOT] AOT fails when response file is written to temp path with non-ASCII characters #113619
  • [API Proposal]: Obsolete RSACryptoServiceProvider.Decrypt,Encrypt with fOAEP #113616
  • [iOS][globalization] Incorrect region information when using `English (US)` language and non-US region #113614
    10.0.0
  • build.sh command on the runtime repo backed to mainline is hanging #113612
  • JSON schema serialization problems at OpenApi schema generation #113610
  • Native AOT ARM32 lanes failing after docker update #113609
    10.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Refactor job artifacts naming for mobile performance testing #113608
    Future
  • [mono][infra] FullAOT x64 linux CI jobs are timing out or running very long #113607
  • HttpClient inconsistant behaviour #113605
    10.0.0
  • Marshal.SizeOf of bool and char report wrong value #113599
  • Add collection literal expression handling to Roslyn analyzer #113597

Closed

  • JIT: "Never-negative" handling is not implemented for Span length fields promoted by physical promotion #104573
    10.0.0
  • Emit custom modifiers into native layout metadata #91381
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: 'ComWrappers.GetOrCreateObjectForComInstance' variant returning 'null' without throwing #113591
  • CultureInfo.DisplayName incorrect on iOS (Android is ok.) #113252
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `ComWrappers` API to only check for an existing RCW #113581
    Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Detected conflicting incoming edges when homing parameter registers"' during 'Generate code' #113486
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow using `StringComparer` at `GetKeyedService` #113386
  • Parametrized constructor for ExpandoObject #25053
  • double.TryParse string "Infinity" behave different on gh action runner/codespaces #113530
  • [NativeAOT] Unexpected GetInterfaceMap Results #113521
  • Question: Enforcing Explicit IOptions<T> Registration to Prevent Silent Defaults #113547
  • Regex Runner Timeout Bug? #113613
  • .NET 9 iOS / HybridGlobalization: currency symbols / currency names not available #108958
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] SocketsHttpHandler_DiagnosticsTest_Http2.SendAsync_ReuseRequestInHandler_ResetsHeadersForEachReuse test failure #113580
  • Memory allocations in desktop AOT builds when using Marshal.SizeOf<T>() #113589
  • Error when trying to implement the JsonSerializerContext and the JsonSerializable #113584
  • Wrong result from CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.Name in iOS #110680
    10.0.0
  • iOS CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.DateTimeFormat.ShortDatePattern not getting OS settings #112099
    10.0.0
  • System.Globalization.RegionInfo.CurrentRegion returns blank values on Maui #110704
    10.0.0
  • HttpClient abort issues in WASM when streaming #112172
    8.0.x
  • Multiple '[ThreadStatic]' accesses resolve each TLS field individually #113601
  • UWP apps require an implementation of .net to WinRT streams #32635
  • Strict assembly loading policy #34562
  • C# "Windows Runtime Component (Universal Windows)" inside C++ solution causes Windows App Certification Kit to fail "Supported API Test" #35018
  • [UWP] Type is not valid for use outside of the managed environment #35171
  • UWP .NET NATIVE Memory #36600
  • Trace information about the origin of assembly resolution #40947
  • Single-File Executable Cannot Use Registration Free COM Interop in .NET 5-Preview 7 #41309
  • PackageCompilationNativeAssetResolver to resolve native assets #41359

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump main to preview4 #113631
    area-Infrastructure
  • [cDAC] Statically link in native dependencies #113627
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Disable recursive tailcall to loop opt in OSR methods #113625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build ILAsm dependencies with secure source hashing enabled in MSVC #113620
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] [HttpStress] Fix Linux HttpStress build #113617
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.x
  • Fix null reference exception in SslStream.Protocol #113606
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Reenable ClientDisableTlsResume_Succeeds test #113604
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Do not throw for `Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(delegate*<void>))` #113603
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Treat Char/Bool as requiring marshalling #113602
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable LongProcessNamesAreSupported on OSX #113600
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process

Merged

  • Recognize "Span.Length" during physical promotion and set IsNeverNegative flag #113615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • LoongArch is a NEW ISA which is different from MIPS #113564
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Revert "Revert "Pin SHAs for container images"" #113598
    needs-area-label
  • Use reflection metadata to represent methods/fields in native layout #113413
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tensor<T> - Fixed missing memory offset from ReadOnlyTensorSpan #113618
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • JIT: Remove oldlayout test configs #113621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow specifying SDK search paths in global.json #113512
    area-Host
  • Switch to AwesomeAssertions #113425
    area-Meta
  • [WinHTTP] Let OS chose SSL/TLS protocol if not set to `WinHttpHandler` #113525
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Remove `LclVarDsc::_lvArgReg` and `_lvOtherArgReg` #113501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Properly handle param reg targets with multiple register assignments #113499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix GetInterfaceMap with respect to generics #113611
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] [wasm] Make response streaming opt-out #111680
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, os-browser
  • [release/8.0][browser][http] mute JS exceptions about network errors + HEAD verb #113271
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [browser] Change default boot config to dotnet.boot.js #113374
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Disable SendAsync_ReuseRequestInHandler_ResetsHeadersForEachReuse on WASM #113543
    area-System.Net.Http
  • performance pipelines triggers unified #113556
    area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • [release/9.0] [browser][http] mute JS exceptions about network errors + HEAD verb #113261
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 9.0.x
  • Use `GetUninitializedObject` to marshal LayoutClass #113529
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [android][tests] Do not package unused CoreCLR libs when building test apks #113209
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 134.0.6998.88, windows: 134.0.6998.89 #113577
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix AcquireCredentialHandle parameter lifetime #113540
    area-System.Net.Security

Updated

  • Improve zero-sized methods check and missing ret at exit #112082
    area-Tools-ILVerification, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Reduce TP for targets with more than 64 Registers #112704
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor Sequential/Explicit layout to happen in the same phase where we do Auto layout #113454
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add ThisptrRetbufPrecode to set of precodes handled by StubPrecode path #112548
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Disallow loading non-Explicit types with explicit field offsets #113500
    breaking-change, area-VM-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Use PackageDownloadAndReference for tasks #113404
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Handle containment for shift instructions with EVEX encoding #111644
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enable containment for BMI2 shift and rotate instructions #111778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [APX] Complete EGPR encoding in X64 backend #113237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Stub Precode variant for DynamicHelpers #113402
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove CopyFile, GetTempFileName from PAL #113490
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Swift projection tooling / dev-ex] Showcase changes in bindings in PRs #3045

PullRequests

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Normalize the box type in resume stubs #3042
    area-async
  • [Swift Bindings] Add support for Equality protocol #3031
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [swift] Use TBD files to retrieve symbols missing from abi.json #3034
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift Bindings] Project value types with heap-allocated properties as C# classes #3038
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Exe project referencing exe project results in the referenced exe being dropped. #47663
  • dotnet/sdk's non-incremental build is slow #47653
  • Error with Exe project dependency when setting -r in dotnet publish #47651
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47650
  • [NETSDKE2E][Mac]NET10.0 preview2 Release Notes hyperlink on the Installation Wizard jumped incorrectly. #47648
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47641

Closed

  • Is it intended that a default ImmutableArray<T>.Length throws NullReferenceException? #47647
  • Race condition in Publish targets #47654
  • `GivenDotnetTest` Failures #46923

PullRequests

Created

  • Add IBC switch and disable by default #47670
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create tsaoptions.json for VMR #47668
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Compare tar.gz files between VMR and current .NET builds #47667
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47665
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check for Muxer path relative to base directory #47664
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • sln-add: Get project DefaultProjectTypeGuid #47661
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Refactor binlog and use in dotnet test and dotnet run #47660
    Area-dotnet test
  • Merge redist installer with redist #47659
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update MSTest templates for .NET 10 #47658
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add cgmanifest.json for test templates #47652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add missing VersionTools package version #47662
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #47655
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Publish symbols of RuntimeAnalyzers #47598
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit specifying to use workload versions in global.json #47421
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Remove unnecessary 32bit arm architecture checks in the Windows build #47656
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Extract templates nupkg generation from GenerateMSIs.targets #47657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47634
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert changes to NativeAot test due to runtime update #47443
    untriaged, Area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • Remove primary vertical concept from JoinVerticals #47338
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Add command 'dotnet project convert' #47500
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • dotnet CLI: Removed CommandLineValidation directory #47619
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • dotnet CLI: Move command folder sources #47620
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update `dotnet run file.cs` spec with new ignored directives syntax #47543
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Update to AwesomeAssertions #47611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #47569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support launchSettings.json workingDirectory with dotnet run #42534
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #47514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
